question.title: Spring boot 3.2 RestClient proxy
question.body:
RestClient has arrived in Spring Boot 3.2. There are a lot of articles and guides online using the good old RestTemplate, not so much about the new arrival. Using the new RestClient, how can I set a proxy in order to make a call to an external IP?

An example where there would also be authentication at the proxy would be best. Something like the solution given here for RestTemplate : Spring RestTemplate and Proxy Auth

Thanks for any help.
